algorithm_technique: Greedy replacement of '?' characters based on position and constraints.
problem_summary_simple: Find the latest valid time by replacing '?' in a 'hh:mm' string.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily fill '?' in 'hh:mm' string to maximize time, considering hour and minute constraints.
key_insights: The problem can be solved greedily by filling the '?' from left to right.
Hour constraints (00-23) and minute constraints (00-59) must be respected.
The most significant digits have the biggest impact on the time.
